<h2 style="text-align: center;">🏠 Get Your FREE Custom Home Value Estimate</h2>
<p style="text-align: center;">
  Curious what your home is worth in today's market? I'll prepare a personalized, no-obligation estimate for you. Just fill out the form below:
</p>

<form name="home-value" method="POST" data-netlify="true" netlify-honeypot="bot-field" action="/success.html" 
      style="max-width: 600px; margin: 30px auto; padding: 25px; border: 1px solid #ccc; border-radius: 10px; background: #fdfdfd;">
  
  <input type="hidden" name="form-name" value="home-value" />

  <!-- Honeypot (spam trap) -->
  <p style="display: none;">
    <label>Don’t fill this out: <input name="bot-field" /></label>
  </p>

  <div style="margin-bottom: 15px;">
    <label for="name">Name:</label><br>
    <input type="text" name="name" id="name" required style="width: 100%; padding: 10px;">
  </div>

  <div style="margin-bottom: 15px;">
    <label for="email">Email:</label><br>
    <input type="email" name="email" id="email" required style="width: 100%; padding: 10px;">
  </div>

  <div style="margin-bottom: 15px;">
    <label for="phone">Phone Number:</label><br>
    <input type="tel" name="phone" id="phone" style="width: 100%; padding: 10px;">
  </div>

  <div style="margin-bottom: 15px;">
    <label for="address">Property Address:</label><br>
    <input type="text" name="address" id="address" required style="width: 100%; padding: 10px;">
  </div>

  <div style="margin-bottom: 15px;">
    <label for="message">Any questions or special details you'd like to add?</label><br>
    <textarea name="message" id="message" rows="4" style="width: 100%; padding: 10px;"></textarea>
  </div>

  <div style="text-align: center;">
    <button type="submit" style="padding: 10px 25px; background-color: #0077cc; color: white; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer;">
      Get My Estimate
    </button>
  </div>
</form>
